name: Electrician
description: Covers electrical wiring, maintenance, and repair of electrical systems.

name: Fitter
description: Focuses on fitting, assembly, and maintenance of machinery components.

name: Mechanic Electric Vehicle
description: Hands-on training in electric vehicle mechanics, motors, and batteries.

name: CNC Machining Technician
description: Training in CNC machine setup, operation, and maintenance for precision manufacturing.

name: Industrial Robotics and Digital Manufacturing Technician
description: Covers industrial robotics, automation systems, and digital manufacturing processes.

name: Manufacturing Process and Automation Control
description: Focuses on modern manufacturing processes, automation, and production line control.

name: Virtual Analysis and Designer FEM
description: Teaches finite element method (FEM), virtual simulation, and product design analysis.

name: Engineering Design Technician
description: Covers CAD tools, product design, drafting, and engineering visualization techniques.
